short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds social features like comments, reactions, and polls to your favorite streaming services (Netflix, Viki, and more)!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reactline is a browser extension that lets you comment on, react to, and bookmark your favorite tv and movie moments.

Add comments!

Let the world know what you think of every moment with Reactline comments! It's the comment section for Netflix (and more) that you always wished existed. You can start the next great conversation while your watching (and no need to hop to another site or app).

Add reactions!

React to your hearts content with the Reactline reaction bar! The reaction bar lets you quickly (with a click or a keyboard shortcut) react to what's happening (sometimes an emoji is worth a 1000 words). And did we mention that it's customizable?
